snippet.title: Manor Madness - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Manor Madness is available on Steam for FREE from the 15th of January! Wish list the game now!

Become a certified poltergeist in this 3D single-player paranormal sandbox game. Take on the role of Ghustav, the ghost, who has just been accepted to the prestigious school of Polter High to learn how to possess objects and throw them across the room. But of course, the traditional haunting can’t be missed.  Flicker the light switch, turn on any electrical appliances or start an eerie melody on the gramophone.   

All while making the humans go insane!

Who are we? 
Apericot Studio is a student-led indie game studio with the goal to design and develop our FREE 3D game called Manor Madness in 14 weeks.

Make sure to follow us on our other socials: https://linktr.ee/apericotstudio
